languages.text: "Чтобы заставить этого духа машины подчиниться, надо знать верную молитву. Стражу нужен пароль".

traits.locale_text: [Draft] Мы должны найти того кто знает нужную команду для этого когитатора

languages.text: "To make this machine spirit do your bidding, you have to know the correct prayer. The sentinel will ask for a password."
languages.original_text: "Чтобы заставить этого духа машины подчиниться, надо знать верную молитву. Стражу нужен пароль".

traits.locale_text: "To make this machine spirit do your bidding, you have to know the correct prayer. A sentinel will ask for a password."
"To make this machine spirit do your bidding, you have to know the correct prayer. A sentinel will ask for a password."
"To make this machine spirit do your bidding, you have to know the correct prayer. The sentinel will ask for a password."
"To make this machine spirit do your bidding, you have to know the correct prayer. The sentinel will ask for a password."
"To make this machine spirit do your bidding, you have to know the correct prayer. The sentinel will ask for a password."
"To make this machine spirit do your bidding, you have to know the correct prayer. The sentinel will ask for a password."

languages.text: "Damit dieser Maschinengeist Euch gehorcht, müsst Ihr das richtige Gebet kennen. Der Wächter wird Euch nach einem Passwort fragen."
languages.original_text: "To make this machine spirit do your bidding, you have to know the correct prayer. The sentinel will ask for a password."

traits.locale_text: "Damit dieser Maschinengeist Euch gehorcht, müsst Ihr das richtige Gebet kennen. Der Wächter wird Euch nach einem Passwort fragen."

languages.text: « Pour que l'esprit de cette machine vous obéisse, il faut connaître la prière correspondante. La sentinelle vous demandera un mot de passe. »
languages.original_text: "To make this machine spirit do your bidding, you have to know the correct prayer. The sentinel will ask for a password."

traits.locale_text: « Pour que l'esprit de cette machine vous obéisse, il faut connaître la prière correspondante. La sentinelle vous demandera un mot de passe. »

languages.text: “若要让这个机魂听从你的命令，你必须知道正确的祷词。它的哨兵会向你索要密码。”
languages.original_text: "To make this machine spirit do your bidding, you have to know the correct prayer. The sentinel will ask for a password."

traits.locale_text: “若要让这个机魂听从你的命令，你必须知道正确的祷词。它的哨兵会向你索要密码。”

languages.text: 「この機械精霊を命令に従わせるには、正しい祈りを知らなければならない。センチネルがパスワードを尋ねるだろう」
languages.original_text: "To make this machine spirit do your bidding, you have to know the correct prayer. The sentinel will ask for a password."

traits.locale_text: 「この機械精霊を命令に従わせるには、正しい祈りを知らなければならない。センチネルがパスワードを尋ねるだろう」

languages.text: «Para que este espíritu máquina cumpla sus órdenes, debe pronunciar la oración correcta. El centinela pedirá una contraseña».
languages.original_text: "To make this machine spirit do your bidding, you have to know the correct prayer. The sentinel will ask for a password."

traits.locale_text: «Para que este espíritu máquina cumpla sus órdenes, debe pronunciar la oración correcta. El centinela pedirá una contraseña».

languages.text: "Bu makine ruhunun emrine itaat etmesini sağlamak için doğru duayı bilmen gerek. Nöbetçi, bir şifre soracaktır."
languages.original_text: "To make this machine spirit do your bidding, you have to know the correct prayer. The sentinel will ask for a password."

traits.locale_text: "Bu makine ruhunun emrine itaat etmesini sağlamak için doğru duayı bilmen gerek. Nöbetçi, bir şifre soracaktır."
